statements: SELECT area_id, area_name, area_type, area_description, area_location FROM protected_areas;
SELECT area_name, area_type, area_location, area_description, area_id FROM protected_areas;
SELECT area_name, area_description FROM protected_areas WHERE area_type = 'National Park';
SELECT area_id, area_location FROM protected_areas WHERE area_name LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT * FROM protected_areas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT area_name, area_type FROM protected_areas WHERE area_type = 'National Park' ORDER BY area_name ASC
SELECT * FROM protected_areas WHERE ST_DWithin(area_location, ST_GeographyFromText('POINT(-122.335167 47.590388)'), 10000) LIMIT 5
SELECT area_name, ST_ASGeoJSON(area_location) AS area_geojson FROM protected_areas WHERE area_type = 'Wildlife Sanctuary'
SELECT area_id, area_name, area_description FROM protected_areas WHERE area_description LIKE '%forest%' ORDER BY area_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS area_count, area_type FROM protected_areas GROUP BY area_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY area_count DESC
SELECT * FROM protected_areas;
SELECT area_name, location FROM protected_areas WHERE area_type = 'National Park';
SELECT id, area_name FROM protected_areas ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT area_name FROM protected_areas;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_areas FROM protected_areas;
SELECT id, area_name FROM protected_areas;
SELECT area_type, location FROM protected_areas WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM protected_areas WHERE area_type = 'National Park';
SELECT area_name, location FROM protected_areas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT area_name, category_name FROM protected_areas INNER JOIN conservation_categories ON protected_areas.id = conservation_categories.id;
SELECT * FROM ProtectedAreas;
SELECT area_name, area_type FROM ProtectedAreas WHERE area_type = 'National Park';
SELECT area_name, area_description FROM ProtectedAreas ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT area_name, latitude, longitude FROM ProtectedAreas JOIN Coordinates ON ProtectedAreas.area_id = Coordinates.area_id;
SELECT name, hired_date FROM ParkRangers WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT area_id, area_name, area_type, area_description FROM ProtectedAreas;
SELECT area_id, area_type, area_name, area_description FROM ProtectedAreas ORDER BY area_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Coordinates WHERE latitude > 50 AND longitude < 0;
SELECT pr.name, pa.area_name, pr.hired_date FROM ParkRangers pr JOIN ProtectedAreas pa ON pr.area_id = pa.area_id;
SELECT pa.area_name, c.latitude, c.longitude FROM ProtectedAreas pa JOIN Coordinates c ON pa.area_id = c.area_id;
SELECT * FROM protected_areas;
SELECT area_name, area_type FROM protected_areas WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM habitats ORDER BY habitat_type DESC;
SELECT species_name, species_type FROM species WHERE habitat_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM protected_areas;
SELECT area_id, area_name, area_type FROM protected_areas WHERE area_type = 'National Park';
SELECT * FROM habitats JOIN protected_areas ON habitats.area_id = protected_areas.area_id;
SELECT species_id, species_name, habitat_type FROM species JOIN habitats ON species.habitat_id = habitats.habitat_id;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM protected_areas;
SELECT area_name, area_location FROM protected_areas;
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM protected_areas WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_species WHERE species_name LIKE '%Lion%';
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_description FROM habitat_types ORDER BY habitat_id DESC;
SELECT area_name, ST_AsText(area_location) FROM protected_areas;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_species WHERE species_name = 'Tiger';
SELECT species_name, species_description FROM wildlife_species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_description FROM habitat_types WHERE habitat_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT area_id, species_name FROM area_species JOIN wildlife_species ON area_species.species_id = wildlife_species.species_id;
